title: possible 1820 skin concept ( infernal fiddlesticks)
body:
Appearance - Dressed in red, heavy armor, similar to risen fiddlesticks but red http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FIH3EBm4G-M/VSR-IkqNLwI/AAAAAAAAnhg/LRUbTe2H9HI/s1600/fiddlefront.jpg

crows - mini phoenixes (http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/flylikeabird3/images/a/ac/Phoenix.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140201160344)

W (drain) - Could be a stream of lava from him to his target

e (dark wind) - throws a mini phoenix that bounces between the targets, with fire particles

r (crowstorm) while channeling, fiddlesticks could be evolving into larger armor. the actual crowstorm could be similar to infernal nasus's e (http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-autBbspBG2Q/Uo1gFJytD8I/AAAAAAAAJfY/EB5ygi_yBXU/s1600/infe.jpg) but with the mini phoenixes circling around.


tell me what you think!

replies.body: Fun fact: when I started working in-house for Riot the first concept I did was for Risen Fiddlesticks, but in the early rounds of exploration I sketched out a number of themes and my personal favourite was an idea for Infernal Fiddlesticks! Hopefully we can revisit it one day.
Maybe a 1350, but 1820 is pushing it
An 1820 skin needs completely new voice acting. So, as long as you have that, you're good.
